00027 /*
00028  * lustre/ptlrpc/nrs_fifo.c
00029  *
00030  * Network Request Scheduler (NRS) FIFO policy
00031  *
00032  * Handles RPCs in a FIFO manner, as received from the network. This policy is
00033  * a logical wrapper around previous, non-NRS functionality. It is used as the
00034  * default and fallback policy for all types of RPCs on all PTLRPC service
00035  * partitions, for both regular and high-priority NRS heads. Default here means
00036  * the policy is the one enabled at PTLRPC service partition startup time, and
00037  * fallback means the policy is used to handle RPCs that are not handled
00038  * successfully or are not handled at all by any primary policy that may be
00039  * enabled on a given NRS head.
00040  *
00041  * Author: Liang Zhen <liang@whamcloud.com>
00042  * Author: Nikitas Angelinas <nikitas_angelinas@xyratex.com>
00043  */
00049 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_RPC
00050 #include <obd_support.h>
00051 #include <obd_class.h>
00052 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00053 #include "ptlrpc_internal.h"
00054 
00064 #define NRS_POL_NAME_FIFO       "fifo"
00065 
00079 static int nrs_fifo_start(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy, char *arg)
00080 {
00081         struct nrs_fifo_head *head;
00082 
00083         OBD_CPT_ALLOC_PTR(head, nrs_pol2cptab(policy), nrs_pol2cptid(policy));
00084         if (head == NULL)
00085                 return -ENOMEM;
00086 
00087         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&head->fh_list);
00088         policy->pol_private = head;
00089         return 0;
00090 }
00091 
00101 static void nrs_fifo_stop(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy)
00102 {
00103         struct nrs_fifo_head *head = policy->pol_private;
00104 
00105         LASSERT(head != NULL);
00106         LASSERT(list_empty(&head->fh_list));
00107 
00108         OBD_FREE_PTR(head);
00109 }
00110 
00129 static int nrs_fifo_res_get(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00130                             struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq,
00131                             const struct ptlrpc_nrs_resource *parent,
00132                             struct ptlrpc_nrs_resource **resp, bool moving_req)
00133 {
00138         *resp = &((struct nrs_fifo_head *)policy->pol_private)->fh_res;
00139         return 1;
00140 }
00141 
00159 static
00160 struct ptlrpc_nrs_request * nrs_fifo_req_get(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00161                                              bool peek, bool force)
00162 {
00163         struct nrs_fifo_head      *head = policy->pol_private;
00164         struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq;
00165 
00166         nrq = unlikely(list_empty(&head->fh_list)) ? NULL :
00167               list_entry(head->fh_list.next, struct ptlrpc_nrs_request,
00168                              nr_u.fifo.fr_list);
00169 
00170         if (likely(!peek && nrq != NULL)) {
00171                 struct ptlrpc_request *req = container_of(nrq,
00172                                                           struct ptlrpc_request,
00173                                                           rq_nrq);
00174 
00175                 list_del_init(&nrq->nr_u.fifo.fr_list);
00176 
00177                 CDEBUG(D_RPCTRACE, "NRS start %s request from %s, seq: "LPU64
00178                        "\n", policy->pol_desc->pd_name,
00179                        libcfs_id2str(req->rq_peer), nrq->nr_u.fifo.fr_sequence);
00180         }
00181 
00182         return nrq;
00183 }
00184 
00194 static int nrs_fifo_req_add(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00195                             struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq)
00196 {
00197         struct nrs_fifo_head *head;
00198 
00199         head = container_of(nrs_request_resource(nrq), struct nrs_fifo_head,
00200                             fh_res);
00204         nrq->nr_u.fifo.fr_sequence = head->fh_sequence++;
00205         list_add_tail(&nrq->nr_u.fifo.fr_list, &head->fh_list);
00206 
00207         return 0;
00208 }
00209 
00216 static void nrs_fifo_req_del(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00217                              struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq)
00218 {
00219         LASSERT(!list_empty(&nrq->nr_u.fifo.fr_list));
00220         list_del_init(&nrq->nr_u.fifo.fr_list);
00221 }
00222 
00233 static void nrs_fifo_req_stop(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00234                               struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq)
00235 {
00236         struct ptlrpc_request *req = container_of(nrq, struct ptlrpc_request,
00237                                                   rq_nrq);
00238 
00239         CDEBUG(D_RPCTRACE, "NRS stop %s request from %s, seq: "LPU64"\n",
00240                policy->pol_desc->pd_name, libcfs_id2str(req->rq_peer),
00241                nrq->nr_u.fifo.fr_sequence);
00242 }
00243 
00247 static const struct ptlrpc_nrs_pol_ops nrs_fifo_ops = {
00248         .op_policy_start        = nrs_fifo_start,
00249         .op_policy_stop         = nrs_fifo_stop,
00250         .op_res_get             = nrs_fifo_res_get,
00251         .op_req_get             = nrs_fifo_req_get,
00252         .op_req_enqueue         = nrs_fifo_req_add,
00253         .op_req_dequeue         = nrs_fifo_req_del,
00254         .op_req_stop            = nrs_fifo_req_stop,
00255 };
00256 
00260 struct ptlrpc_nrs_pol_conf nrs_conf_fifo = {
00261         .nc_name                = NRS_POL_NAME_FIFO,
00262         .nc_ops                 = &nrs_fifo_ops,
00263         .nc_compat              = nrs_policy_compat_all,
00264         .nc_flags               = PTLRPC_NRS_FL_FALLBACK |
00265                                   PTLRPC_NRS_FL_REG_START
00266 };
